com.pump.image.transition

Class ImageInstruction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pump.image.transition.Transition2DInstruction
      • com.pump.image.transition.ImageInstruction

  • public class ImageInstruction
extends Transition2DInstruction
    This is an instruction to render an image.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.awt.Shape clipping
      This is the clipping to apply.
      boolean isFirstFrame
      If this is true, then this instruction relates to Frame A.
      float opacity
      This is the opacity of this image.
      java.awt.geom.AffineTransform transform
      This is the transform to render this graphic through.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ImageInstruction(boolean isFirstFrame)
      Renders a completely opaque image, anchored at (0,0), at its original size with no clipping.
      ImageInstruction(boolean isFirstFrame, java.awt.geom.AffineTransform transform, java.awt.Shape clipping) 
      ImageInstruction(boolean isFirstFrame, float opacity)

    • Field Detail

      • isFirstFrame

        public boolean isFirstFrame
        If this is true, then this instruction relates to Frame A. Otherwise this relates to Frame B.

      • clipping

        public java.awt.Shape clipping
        This is the clipping to apply. This may be null, indicating that clipping is not needed.

      • transform

        public java.awt.geom.AffineTransform transform
        This is the transform to render this graphic through. This may be null, indicating that no transform is needed.

      • opacity

        public float opacity
        This is the opacity of this image. By default this value is 1.

      • ImageInstruction

        public ImageInstruction(boolean isFirstFrame)
        Renders a completely opaque image, anchored at (0,0), at its original size with no clipping.
        Parameters:
        isFirstFrame - indicates whether to use the original image or the incoming image.
